title: How GOOD are $40 earbuds? - OnePlus Nord Buds
description: Join us in War Thunder for FREE at  and get an exclusive bonus using our link - thanks for supporting the channel!  $40 for earbuds isn't uncommon today, but you're always going to be a bit suspicious of claimed audio quality by the brand. The OnePlus Nord Buds had us interested, and they delivered all of the claims. Well, maybe except for the pairing function, but small details.   Check out the OnePlus Nord Buds at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 - Oh hey, new host! 0:25 - Pricing and overview 1:13 - Unboxing 2:07 - Exterior first impressions 3:18 - Comfort impressions 4:08 - Specs and weight 4:48 - App overview 5:20 - Sponsor - War Thunder 6:06 - Pairing the earbuds impressions 7:24 - Affordability thoughts 8:26 - EQ settings 8:51 - Audio quality impressions 11:02 - Call quality impressions 11:40 - Outro
